Hold Alt-SysRq, press and release R, press and release E ...
A key on your keyboard - probably labelled "Print Screen / SysRq", or just "Print Screen" if the makers were lazy.
The SysRq key is very rarely used these days, so it might be not labelled that ... just look for PrintScreen.
